Currently, mathlib has several different names for the map from a uniform space to its completion.

  • If Œ± is a uniform space with no other structure, it is called (UniformSpace.Completion.coe' : Œ± ‚Üí Completion Œ±) (though more often written as ((‚Üë) : Œ± ‚Üí Completion Œ±))
  • If Œ± is a uniform additive group, the same function is also a group homomorphism, called (UniformSpace.Completion.toCompl : Œ± ‚Üí+ Completion Œ±).
  • If Œ± is a uniform ring, the same function is also a ring homomorphism, called (UniformSpace.Completion.coeRingHom : Œ± ‚Üí+* Completion Œ±).
  • If Œ± is a normed space over a field ùïú, the same function is also a linear isometry, called (UniformSpace.Completion.toCompl‚Çó·µ¢ : Œ± ‚Üí‚Çó·µ¢[ùïú] Completion Œ±).
  • If Œ± is a normed space over a field ùïú, the same function is also a continuous linear map, called (UniformSpace.Completion.toComplL : Œ± ‚ÜíL[ùïú] Completion Œ±).
  • If Œ± is a normed additive group, the same function is also a norm-preserving group homomorphism, called (NormedAddCommGroup.toCompl : NormedAddGroupHom Œ± (Completion Œ±))

(As of the merging of #20514 14 hours ago, Œ± is an implicit argument of all six of these functions.)

These names are inconsistent. I recently opened #20527, which renames these functions, respectively, to:

  • UniformSpace.Completion.coe
  • UniformSpace.Completion.coeAddHom
  • UniformSpace.Completion.coeRingHom (unchanged)
  • UniformSpace.Completion.coe‚Çó·µ¢
  • UniformSpace.Completion.coeL
  • UniformSpace.Completion.coeNormedAddGroupHom

However, @Eric Wieser pointed out (https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/20527#issuecomment-2574060539) that perhaps these are not the best names either.

/poll What should the functions be called?
UniformSpace.Completion.coe, UniformSpace.Completion.coeAddHom, UniformSpace.Completion.coeRingHom, UniformSpace.Completion.coe‚Çó·µ¢, UniformSpace.Completion.coeL, UniformSpace.Completion.coeNormedAddGroupHom
UniformSpace.Completion.mk, UniformSpace.Completion.mkAddHom, UniformSpace.Completion.mkRingHom, UniformSpace.Completion.mk‚Çó·µ¢, UniformSpace.Completion.mkL, UniformSpace.Completion.mkNormedAddGroupHom
UniformSpace.Completion.of, UniformSpace.Completion.ofAddHom, UniformSpace.Completion.ofRingHom, UniformSpace.Completion.of‚Çó·µ¢, UniformSpace.Completion.ofL, UniformSpace.Completion.ofNormedAddGroupHom
